description: Describes an edge deployment plan with deployment status per stage.

parameters.name: EdgeDeploymentPlanName
parameters.description: The name of the deployment plan to describe.

nested_items.name: EdgeDeploymentPlanArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of edge deployment plan.

nested_items.name: EdgeDeploymentPlanName
nested_items.description: The name of the edge deployment plan.

nested_items.name: ModelConfigs
nested_items.description: List of models associated with the edge deployment plan.

nested_items.name: ModelHandle
nested_items.description: The name the device application uses to reference this model.

nested_items.name: EdgePackagingJobName
nested_items.description: The edge packaging job associated with this deployment.

nested_items.name: DeviceFleetName
nested_items.description: The device fleet used for this edge deployment plan.

nested_items.name: EdgeDeploymentSuccess
nested_items.description: The number of edge devices with the successful deployment.

nested_items.name: EdgeDeploymentPending
nested_items.description: The number of edge devices yet to pick up deployment, or in progress.

nested_items.name: EdgeDeploymentFailed
nested_items.description: The number of edge devices that failed the deployment.

nested_items.name: Stages
nested_items.description: List of stages in the edge deployment plan.

nested_items.name: StageName
nested_items.description: The name of the stage.

nested_items.name: DeviceSelectionConfig
nested_items.description: Configuration of the devices in the stage.

nested_items.name: DeviceSubsetType
nested_items.description: Type of device subsets to deploy to the current stage.

nested_items.name: Percentage
nested_items.description: Percentage of devices in the fleet to deploy to the current stage.

nested_items.name: DeviceNames
nested_items.description: List of devices chosen to deploy.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DeviceNameContains
nested_items.description: A filter to select devices with names containing this name.

nested_items.name: DeploymentConfig
nested_items.description: Configuration of the deployment details.

nested_items.name: FailureHandlingPolicy
nested_items.description: Toggle that determines whether to rollback to previous configuration if the current deployment fails. By default this is turned on. You may turn this off if you want to investigate the errors yourself.

nested_items.name: DeploymentStatus
nested_items.description: General status of the current state.

nested_items.name: StageStatus
nested_items.description: The general status of the current stage.

nested_items.name: EdgeDeploymentSuccessInStage
nested_items.description: The number of edge devices with the successful deployment in the current stage.

nested_items.name: EdgeDeploymentPendingInStage
nested_items.description: The number of edge devices yet to pick up the deployment in current stage, or in progress.

nested_items.name: EdgeDeploymentFailedInStage
nested_items.description: The number of edge devices that failed the deployment in current stage.

nested_items.name: EdgeDeploymentStatusMessage
nested_items.description: A detailed message about deployment status in current stage.

nested_items.name: EdgeDeploymentStageStartTime
nested_items.description: The time when the deployment API started.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Token to use when calling the next set of stages in the edge deployment plan.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the edge deployment plan was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The time when the edge deployment plan was last updated.
